title: (unpopular opinion) a rant on urf
body: urf keeps getting more unfun each year. ever since arurf replaced urf, it’s all about getting broken champs. and with the catapult of champions, it’s just boring going back and forth and dying for no reason. only thing i like in this urf is the urf drake.

replies.body: I too, disagree. The cannon is a fun addition. Just use it properly. No more waiting 60 seconds for tp to come up. I do think they should bring back old Urf though, but it doesn't ruin the experience that we have long awaited...
